BIO

Hi there, I'm Aparna Janardhanan

As a web developer with 1.5 years of experience specializing in ReactJS, I'm passionate about building user-friendly and performant web applications using cutting-edge technologies. Throughout my career, I have worked on various projects where I have gained hands-on experience in developing responsive and interactive user interfaces. ReactJS has been my primary framework, and I thoroughly enjoy working with its component-based architecture, virtual DOM, and powerful ecosystem of libraries and tools. I have a strong understanding of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, which are the foundational technologies of web development. I'm skilled in leveraging React's state management, lifecycle methods, and hooks to create reusable and efficient components. Additionally, I'm proficient in using popular libraries and frameworks like Redux, React Router, and Axios to enhance the functionality and performance of applications.

2021 - 2023

Dexlock Technologies

Front End Developer

I love my work and enjoy each new project as I get it. Feel free to have a look at my portfolio and don't hesitate to contact me if you think I can be of service to you.
